title: Ed Davey – 2022 Comments Calling for a General Election
author: admin
summary: The comments made by Ed Davey, the Leader of the Liberal Democrats, on 14 October 2022.
content:
Boris Johnson failed our country and now Liz Truss has broken our economy.
  *[ISIL]: Islamic State of Iraq and the Levant
  *[SDGs]: Sustainable Development Goals
  *[IMF]: International Monetary Fund
  *[UN]: United Nations
  *[GDP]: Gross Domestic Product

It’s time the British people were given their say on this shower of a Conservative party.
  *[ISIL]: Islamic State of Iraq and the Levant
  *[SDGs]: Sustainable Development Goals
  *[IMF]: International Monetary Fund
  *[UN]: United Nations
  *[GDP]: Gross Domestic Product

We need a General Election now.
  *[ISIL]: Islamic State of Iraq and the Levant
  *[SDGs]: Sustainable Development Goals
  *[IMF]: International Monetary Fund
  *[UN]: United Nations
  *[GDP]: Gross Domestic Product
